function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Complex microfluidic systems with interconnected networks may be prone to contamination and spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Risk of inaccurate diagnostic results and potential transmission of diseases to operators and patients.","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and maintenance of the microfluidic elements, proper disposal of contaminated materials, and implementation of strict infection control protocols.","Technologies":"Use of self-cleaning surfaces, disposable microfluidic devices, and automated cleaning systems.","People":"Operators, patients, and healthcare workers.","Owner":"Healthcare facilities and manufacturers of microfluidic devices."},{"Description":"Low-cost mass production of LOC-based devices may lead to compromised quality control and increased risk of device malfunction.","Impact":"Higher probability of device failure, leading to inaccurate diagnostic results and potential exposure to contaminants.","Mitigation":"Implement stringent quality control measures, regular testing of devices, and adherence to regulatory standards for device manufacturing.","Technologies":"Advanced testing equipment, automated quality control systems, and real-time monitoring sensors.","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, and manufacturers.","Owner":"Regulatory agencies, healthcare facilities, and manufacturers of LOC-based devices."},{"Description":"Widespread use of LOC-based techniques for viral detection may create false positives or false negatives in diagnostic results.","Impact":"Misdiagnosis of viral diseases, delayed treatment, and potential spread of contagious viruses due to incorrect diagnosis.","Mitigation":"Validation of LOC-based techniques with traditional testing methods, regular calibration of detection systems, and continuous training of operators.","Technologies":"Integrated validation modules, cross-checking systems with traditional testing methods, and training simulators for operators.","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, and researchers.","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, research institutions, and regulatory agencies."}]}
